description: This file defines a custom theming class 'AppTheme' for a Flutter application, providing cohesive Material 3 theme data including color schemes, text styles, and component themes, specifically for an Ocean Professional aesthetic.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing a customized Material 3 theme for the application, including color schemes, text styles, and component themes.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns the complete ThemeData object configured for the Ocean Professional Material 3 theme.
